title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6170.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6170.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

To provide objective standards for the fair and uniform
treatment of crime victims by criminal justice agencies in order to enhance
delivery of needed services to crime victims, encourage increased public
cooperation and support of the criminal justice process, improve the overall
effectiveness of the criminal justice system as it concerns crime victims and
the public in general, help insure that criminal justice agencies treat crime
victims and witnesses with dignity and understanding, and serve as a model for
the treatment of victims and witnesses by all agencies of
government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6170.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
